item.title: PLACEMENT ROADMAP
item.author: hariprasathcce@gmail.com (Hariprasath)
item.description: Aptitude Placement Training is enough for aptitude. Additional Resources : Aptitude book: RS Agarwal Programming Learn the programming language (Java, Python) in w3schools or Youtube. Then Practice problems in HackerRank Alogrithms , HackerRank DS(Preferred) or Leetcode. Easy to Medium Level programming problems are enough to learn. Cheatsheets ZOHO - https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/interview-experiences/zoho-interview-questions-and-answers-for-technical-profiles/ Cognizant - https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/dsa/cognizant-sde-sheet-interview-questions-and-answers/ Kaar - https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/interview-experiences/kaar-technologies-interview-experience/ TCS - https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/dsa/tcs-sde-sheet-interview-questions-and-answers/
